name: FloppOsseum
description: FloppOsseum is a revolutionary next step in football and football-like sports. Embrace your birthright as a warrior given the power to launch your foes like soggy potato wedges. Use a variety of weapons, each hand-crafted by master artisans, to send all manner of hostile creature flying to the goal. Bask in the glory of your high score and use it as a talking point in professional conversations. Enter the FloppOsseum today!!
